os:OpenSearchDescription.os:Description: Provides interoperable access, following ISO/OGC interface guidelines, to various metadata.

param:Parameter.name: q
param:Parameter.title: Textual search in the title, abstract of keyword section of the metadata. Surround with double quotes for exact match.

param:Parameter.name: maxRecords
param:Parameter.title: Number of results returned per page (default 10)

param:Parameter.name: bbox
param:Parameter.title: Region of Interest defined by 'west, south, east, north' coordinates of longitude, latitude, in decimal degrees (EPSG:4326)

param:Parameter.name: recordIds
param:Parameter.title: Metadata identifier

param:Parameter.name: geometry
param:Parameter.title: Region of Interest defined in Well Known Text standard (WKT) with coordinates in decimal degrees (EPSG:4326)

param:Parameter.name: relation
param:Parameter.title: The spatial operator to apply using the value of the geometry parameter. (default value: Intersects)

param:Parameter.name: lat
param:Parameter.title: Latitude expressed in decimal degrees (EPSG:4326) - should be used with geo:lon

param:Parameter.name: lon
param:Parameter.title: Longitude expressed in decimal degrees (EPSG:4326) - should be used with geo:lat

param:Parameter.name: radius
param:Parameter.title: Expressed in meters - should be used with geo:lon and geo:lat

param:Parameter.name: name
param:Parameter.title: Location string e.g. Paris, France

param:Parameter.name: time
param:Parameter.title: Start date/End date of the time interval to be compared with the data acquisition time.

param:Parameter.name: trelation
param:Parameter.title: The temporal operator to apply using the value of the time parameter. (default value: TEquals for single date, AnyInteracts for period)
